Coban Rondo is a stunning waterfall located in Malang, Indonesia. It serves as a vital recreational spot for local communities, supporting tourism and providing a peaceful retreat. The waterfall is renowned for its lush, green surroundings and breathtaking scenery. Location Start a Journey
Add Picture
Add Review Wow! Visiting Coban Rondo was an incredible experience. The walk to the waterfall was so peaceful, surrounded by lush greenery and diverse wildlife. Its amazing how this spot connects so many communities and supports their way of life.
